[h2]亮点[/h2] [list] [*]增加 新特住宅区主题的主菜单背景。 [*]改进 减少在简报后方显示的摄像头画面中的静态干扰。 [*]调整 多种武器在蹲下射击时更加精准。 [/list]
[h2]Weapons[/h2] [i]Weapon recoil has been changed on several guns. A coding error was previously causing "flattened" recoil to work differently when aiming north or south versus east or west.[/i] [list] [*][b]22A3-1 Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° (wide) × 03° (tall) → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A4-2 Combat Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A5 Heavy Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 06° × 03° → 06° × 01°. [*][b]22A7-Z Prototype Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]50CMG4-1:[/b] Normal spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 20° × 10°. Crouch spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 10° × 05°. [*][b]IAF Medical SMG:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]IAF Minigun:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]K80 Personal Defense Weapon:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]M42 Vindicator:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]Model 35 Pump-action Shotgun:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]PS50 Bulldog:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]S23A SynTek Autogun:[/b] Normal spread: 07° × 07° → 07° × 03°. Crouch spread: 07° × 07° → 04° × 01°. [/list]
[h2]任务改进[/h2] [list] [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Made the ceiling of the elevator slightly transparent to help with camera rotation. [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Fixed some flickering on the exit door of the elevator. [*]修复 [b]雅格布的栖息地: 迪马地表大桥[/b] 部分大桥上的爪虫刷新点导致异形卡住的问题。 [*]改进 [b]雅格布的栖息地: 迪马地表大桥[/b] 猛攻刷新在大桥末端的问题。 [*][b]Research 7: Illyn Forest:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. [*][b]Research 7: Jericho Mines:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. [*]修复 [b]塔诺尔之泪：废弃的维修通道[/b] 异形在激光附近卡住的问题。 [*]修复 [b]塔诺尔之泪：绿洲殖民地太空港[/b] 一处控制室内小爆虫刷新点失效的问题。 [*]修复 [b]蒂拉鲁斯-5：北极渗透[/b] 第一个气闸门附近误导性的碰撞箱。 [*][b]Tilarus-5: Communication Center Sweep:[/b] Fixed some rare crashes and improved visals. [*][b]Lana's Escape: Lana's Bridge:[/b] Fixed there sometimes not being enough hackable panels to fix the bridge. [*][b]Paranoia: Hostile Places:[/b] Minor visual improvements. [*]修复 [b]偏执症：高度紧张[/b] 一些地面闪烁的情况。 [*][b]Paranoia: Crucial Point:[/b] Reduced terrain complexity that did not affect gameplay or visuals for slightly faster load time. [*]修复 [b]纳姆.霍姆纳：十七号平台[/b] 猛攻刷新在平台轨道的半空中的问题。 [*]修复 [b]纳姆.霍姆纳：基础实验室[/b] 前八个士兵（一些特殊游戏模式有超过八名玩家）之后的士兵出生后无法下落的问题。 [*]修复 [b]纳姆.霍姆纳：基础实验室[/b] 接近中央区域时的性能卡顿问题。 [*]修复 [b]无家可归：沦陷之城[/b] 任务结束区域一些虫卵附近的火焰点燃非常缓慢的问题。 [*][b]DM Desert:[/b] Fixed obstacles being tinted dark blue. [/list]
《异形丛生：虫启天降》更新 - 2025年11月1日“弹道散布”
